metadata.title: Furkan Baytekin

metadata.author: Furkan Baytekin
metadata.keywords: furkan, baytekin, web, book, blog, portfolio, developer, programmer, programming, musician, music, bass guitarist, music recommendation, frontend, backend, fullstack, software, web development

main.title: I'm Furkan Baytekin
main.description: I'm a Software Developer who has an educational background, so I can teach you how to code. I also describe myself as an open sourcerer. I play the bass guitar and keen on reading books. I obsessed with vinyl records and retro stuff (to get away from the software for a bit).
